name: CryNooker
description:
How to play:

You have 1 minute to feed the baby all the candy. However when monsters are lurking the baby gets scared and hides. Earn points for every candy fed to the baby. Try and get the highest score!

Controls:

Switch Weapons with "z" and "x"

Hold Left Mouse button to drag and hit.

Z : SlingShot --> drag candy in the opposite direction to fire

X: Mallet --> Hit Monsters before they eat all the candy and scare the baby away.
